title: Crystals: flowers of the mineral kingdom
brief_description: Discusses the shape of crystals, depicts frost farming and goes on to show simple applications of crystals. The relationship between crystal properties and uses is illustrated with aluminium.
description: Discusses the shape of crystals, depicts frost farming and goes on to show simple applications of crystals. The relationship between crystal properties and uses is illustrated with aluminium.
